hero.description: I create stunning digital experiences that connect with users and achieve business goals.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
👋 I'm Yasser Alshareef, a fresh IT graduate 🎓, passionate developer 👨‍💻, designer 🎨, and tech lover ⚙️.

🏆 I’ve won 10+ hackathons and earned 4+ awards in tech and innovation. I'm also the founder of a tech startup, focused on creative digital solutions.

💡 I blend technical skills and creativity to build user-friendly experiences — from frontend interfaces 🎯, to backend systems 🔧, and mobile apps 📱.
